\n \n \n Test Domain And Report Trees\n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n
Test Domain And Report Trees
open${base_url}/foo_module/FooModule_createObjects
assertTextPresentCreated Successfully.
open${base_url}/foo_module/Zuite_waitForActivities
assertTextPresentDone.
open${base_url}/foo_module/FooModule_viewFooList/listbox/ListBox_setPropertyList?field_domain_tree=checked;field_domain_root_list=foo_category%7CFoo%20Category
assertTextPresentSet Successfully.
open${base_url}/foo_module/view
assertElementNotPresentdomain_root_url
clickAndWaitid=listbox_domain_tree_mode
verifySelecteddomain_root_urlFoo Category
verifyText//table[@id="listbox_domain_tree_table"]//tr[1]//a[@class="tree_closed"]a
verifyText//table[@id="listbox_domain_tree_table"]//tr[2]//a[@class="tree_closed"]b
verifyTextid=listbox_record_number10 records
verifyText//tr[@id="listbox_data_line_0"]/td[2]0
verifyText//tr[@id="listbox_data_line_1"]/td[2]1
verifyText//tr[@id="listbox_data_line_2"]/td[2]2
clickAndWait//table[@id="listbox_domain_tree_table"]//tr[1]//a[@class="tree_closed"]
verifySelecteddomain_root_urlFoo Category
verifyText//table[@id="listbox_domain_tree_table"]//tr[1]//a[@class="tree_open"]a
verifyText//table[@id="listbox_domain_tree_table"]//tr[2]//a[@class="tree_closed"]a1
verifyText//table[@id="listbox_domain_tree_table"]//tr[3]//a[@class="tree_closed"]a2
verifyText//table[@id="listbox_domain_tree_table"]//tr[4]//a[@class="tree_closed"]b
verifyTextid=listbox_record_number7 records
verifyText//tr[@id="listbox_data_line_0"]/td[2]0
verifyText//tr[@id="listbox_data_line_1"]/td[2]2
verifyText//tr[@id="listbox_data_line_2"]/td[2]3
open${base_url}/foo_module/FooModule_viewFooList/listbox/ListBox_setPropertyList?field_report_tree=checked;field_report_root_list=foo_category%7CFoo%20Category%0Afoo_empty_category%7CFoo%20Empty%20Category
assertTextPresentSet Successfully.
open${base_url}/foo_module/view
assertElementNotPresentreport_root_url
clickAndWaitid=listbox_report_tree_mode
verifySelectedreport_root_urlFoo Category
\n \n \n
